Authentic Travel Designers

We create distinctive, made-to-measure travel experiences that immerse you into the rich culture of Morocco. Born into the traditional nomadic lifestyle and having experienced it first-hand, we are a close-knit team of local experts and experienced travellers whose passion and thirst for discovery ensures that we offer the cutting edge of authentic and immersive travel.


About us

“I’ve never booked through a travel company before and was overwhelmed by the local knowledge and thoughtfulness of the trip.”

- DB, London, UK

Discover all that Morocco has to offer

Our goal is to help people do more, and be more, through immersive travel. We believe that the benefits of travel go way beyond your holiday – both for you, the traveler, and for the local communities we support. Our mission is to share with you the world of possibility Morocco has to offer. Here is a flavour of what we could organise for you…

Explore an ancient culture

The Berbers – a vast multilingual ethnic tribe indigenous to northern Africa – ruled Morocco through a series of dynasties. Morocco’s heritage is forever entwined with the ancient tribal influence and traditions of the Berbers. Whether you’re strolling through the streets of an ancient medina, shopping for spices in a centuries-old souk, or following a chain of pack mules up to a remote Berber village, the air in Morocco is dense with history.

Head for the hills

Morocco offers vast areas of desert and mountain ranges. Rich with untouched natural splendor, Morocco’s wilderness has been home to nomadic berber tribes for centuries. Venture into the scorching dunes of the desert on camelback to experience a unique night under the stars. Or explore the scenic green valleys and white peaks of the high atlas mountains and conquer Mount Toubkal, Morocco’s highest peak at 4,167 metres.

Eat like a local

One of the best things about travel is enjoying the local cuisine. Influenced by Andalusian Spain, Arabia and France, Moroccan cooking abounds with subtle spices and intriguing flavour combinations. Think tart green olives paired with preserved lemon rind stirred into a tagine of tender chicken, the surprise of rich pigeon meat pie dusted with cinnamon and icing sugar, or the heartwarming first bite of a homemade traditional couscous.

Meet traditional artisans

Gain a deeper insight into the art of traditional Moroccan handcrafts. Handed down from one generation to the next, Moroccan artisans have learned their trades of their parents and grandparents and keep them alive. Explore Morocco’s artisanal heritage through pungent tanneries and skilled leather working, discover the deeper meaning behind the colourful woven rugs and get your hands (and feet!) dirty with iconic red ceramic clay.

How it works

As the world opens up to us and the options on our horizons broaden, travel planning can become increasingly confusing and time consuming. With so much to discover, it is our mission to curate the optimal holiday for you. Based on experience, we offer individually tailored travel and event-planning, from the initial sharing of ideas and possibilities to final meticulous planning and logistics. Simply follow our 3 step approach.

1. Talk to Us

Drop us an email or fill out the form to tell us your travel wishes. Understanding is the key to our work and it sets us apart from the rest.

2. Create Trip Plan

Following a dialogue, together we’ll create a trip itinerary that’s tailored to your needs. No matter what you’d like to do, we’ll do our best to make it happen.

3. Book it

Once we’ve mapped out your trip and you’re happy with the plan, book it, sit back, relax and look forward to your trip. You can leave the rest to us.

Take the Plunge

Drop us an email or fill out the contact form. Tell us your requirements and we’ll start customising your trip!

Email: berbermorocco@gmail.com
